text: Banadaspus was king of the Iazyges from an unknown date until 174AD. He was overthrown by his people after attempting to make a peace deal with the Roman Empire. Zanticus succeeded him as king of the Iazyges. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Books=== * * * Category:2nd-century monarchs in Europe Category:Sarmatian rulers
title: Banadaspus
